subject: Customs
description_text: Good day, I ordered something from you on AliExpress, the tracking number is 1ZJ455510432292566. According to UPS, the package was held up at customs and will not be forwarded because information is missing. I wanted to ask if anyone has contacted you or if you know more about it.

conversations.body_text: Hi Nikez, An invoice has been provided to you in the buyer's session; you can try it.
